commandDescription: Search permissionsets inside project and create a static resource file with permissionsets, used to solve the recordtype assignment upgrade issue in dx unlock package
packageFlagDescription: Name of the package to generate the permissionset patch
permsetDirFlagDescription: Path for permissionset folder located in project
apiversion: The api version to be used for the static resource to be generated
loglevel: [default: info] logging level for this command invocation
